title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, August 19, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Gene Roddenberry (1921-1991), who created the sci-fi franchise Star Trek, which was unique in that it imagined a generally peaceful future.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Gene Roddenberry (1921-1991), who created the sci-fi franchise Star Trek, which was unique in that it imagined a generally peaceful future.
